Constructor Detail

Car

public Car()
Default constructor. Set a default position, an initial velocity of 0, a new CarGUI and to finish a desired velocity of 0

           java.lang.Float y,
           java.lang.Float velocity,
           java.lang.Float desiredVelocity)
Overload constructor to initialize attributes

Parameters:
x - The position of the car on the x axis
y - The position of the car on the y axis
velocity - The initial velocity
desiredVelocity - Desired velocity
